title: HUGE 2-bedroom with office - Great location by Lake
posting_body: Huge two-bedroom vintage apartment with space for a home office is available for October 1!
Two big bedrooms with a lot of closet space, large living room, dining room, big kitchen and space for an office!
Also has a great back deck.
Lots of light and windows, hardwood floors throughout and beautifully landscaped courtyard.
On-site laundry and free personal storage area.
Located one block west of Lake Shore and three blocks east of Wrigley Field.
It's a fantastic location, close to the Lake, Whole Foods, Jewel, restaurants, bars, etc.
Two-minute walk to Lake Shore buses (145, 146, 151, 135) and ten-minute walk to CTA Red Line Addison.
